TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler(object sender, ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs)
public delegate void ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将用来处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托定义为事件类。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 你可以访问事件类在 Global.asax 文件中为 ASP.NET 应用程序，如本主题的示例中所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application, as shown in the example for this topic. 引发事件的页执行末尾如果属性是`true`。The event is raised at the end of page execution if the property is `true`. 方法自动确定属性是否组成基元类型、 字符串或已更改对象，通过检查每个属性值用户配置文件中。The method automatically determines whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or objects have been changed, by checking the property value for each in the user profile. 但是，方法无法明确确定是否已更改的自定义类。However, the method cannot explicitly determine whether a custom class has changed. 你可以处理事件来确定是否已修改的自定义对象，然后继续自动保存已修改的对象，并取消自动保存，如果任何对象进行了不修改。You can handle the event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and to continue with the automatic save for modified objects and cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified. 若要取消保存操作的自动配置文件，请设置属性`false`中事件; 否则，设置属性`true`。To cancel the automatic profile save operation, set the property to `false` in the event; otherwise, set the property to `true`. 可能有多个订阅服务器到事件。There may be multiple subscribers to the event. 将使用最后一个值，属性设置为。The will use the last value that the property is set to. 因此，建议显式设置中的属性事件，而不考虑是否要取消或继续自动保存，因为你可能需要覆盖以前的订户设置的值。As a result, it is recommended that you explicitly set the property in the event, regardless of whether you are canceling or continuing with the automatic save, as you may need to overwrite the value set by an earlier subscriber. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving/CS/global.asax#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving/VB/global.asax#11)]
